Aesthetic Timer is a simple timer app built with Flutter using the BLoC pattern for state management and Rive for the cool animation. I made this app in practice for using **state machines** in rive while I continuously learn neat ways to implement the **bloc pattern**.

![Aesthetic Timer Gif](screenshots/aesthetic_timer.gif){: .w-75 .shadow .rounded-10 w='1212' h='668'}
_start, pause and reset the timer_

## Screenshots

![Screenshot 1](screenshots/aesthetic_timer_app_dl.png){: .w-75 .shadow .rounded-10 w='1212' h='668'}

![Screenshot 2](screenshots/aesthetic_timer_app_ld.png){: .w-75 .shadow .rounded-10 w='1212' h='668'}

## Features

- **Modern Design:** An aesthetic and intuitive user interface.
- **Theming:** Switch between light and dark themes. This is set to system theme.
- **Efficient State Management:** Utilizes Bloc for state management.
- **Flutter Animations:** Rive+Flutter.

## Getting Started

- Clone the project from [GitHub repository link](https://github.com/eliascreates/aesthetic_timer).

## Technologies Used

- **Flutter:** Developed using the Flutter framework.
- **Bloc:** State management with the Bloc library.
- **Rive:** Tool for building beautiful custom and interactive animations.
